entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
